concept.title: Users
concept.shortdesc: User management allows you to say who can use the system to do what, and who can access what data.

conbody.p: user management is organized around user roles and user authorizations. Your user role defines what parts of the you can use, and your user authorization together with data visibilities, are used in access policies that specify how user with your access authorizations are allowed to interact with data.
User information is set and modified on the Manage Users page.
